Title: Executive Summary Generator
PromptText: You are a senior management consultant at a Big Four firm. Summarize the following document into an executive summary for C-suite stakeholders. Include: key findings (3-5 bullet points), strategic recommendations, immediate next steps, and potential risks. Limit to 500 words. Use professional, authoritative tone.
BestPractices: Provide context about the audience. For board presentations, focus on strategic implications. For operational reviews, include more tactical details.

Title: Proposal Outline Builder
PromptText: Create a comprehensive proposal outline for a consulting engagement. The proposal should include: 1. Executive Summary 2. Understanding of Client Needs 3. Our Approach & Methodology 4. Project Timeline & Milestones 5. Team & Resources 6. Investment Summary 7. Why Choose Us 8. Next Steps
BestPractices: Tailor the tone to match client culture. Include specific deliverables for each phase.

Title: Market Analysis Report
PromptText: Conduct a comprehensive market analysis for [INDUSTRY/MARKET]. Structure your analysis: 1. Market Overview 2. Competitive Landscape 3. Industry Trends 4. Opportunities & Threats 5. Strategic Recommendations. Use data-driven language and cite industry benchmarks where applicable.
BestPractices: Request specific data sources or ranges. Validate AI outputs against recent industry reports.

Title: Professional Email Composer
PromptText: Draft a professional email with the following parameters: Purpose: [REQUEST/UPDATE/FOLLOW-UP/ESCALATION] Recipient: [NAME & ROLE] Tone: [FORMAL/SEMI-FORMAL/CASUAL] Key Message: [MAIN POINT] Action Required: [SPECIFIC ASK] Deadline (if any): [DATE]. The email should be concise (under 200 words), clear, and actionable. Include a compelling subject line.
BestPractices: Always review AI-generated emails for appropriate tone. Personalize greetings based on relationship.

Title: Meeting Notes Summarizer
PromptText: Transform the following meeting notes/transcript into a structured summary. Required Output: 1. Key Discussion Points (bullet format) 2. Decisions Made 3. Action Items (with owner and deadline) 4. Open Issues/Parking Lot Items 5. Next Steps
BestPractices: Include speaker attributions for accountability. Flag any unclear decisions for follow-up.

Title: Status Report Generator
PromptText: Generate a weekly project status report. Format the report with: RAG Status with justification, Progress percentage, Key milestones achieved, Budget status, Stakeholder communications needed.
BestPractices: Be honest about RAG status. Include quantifiable metrics where possible.

Title: Competitive Intelligence Analyzer
PromptText: Analyze the competitive landscape for [COMPANY/PRODUCT] in the [INDUSTRY] sector: 1. Direct Competitors 2. SWOT Analysis 3. Competitive Positioning 4. Strategic Recommendations. Focus on actionable insights rather than generic observations.
BestPractices: Cross-reference with recent earnings calls and press releases. Note data freshness limitations.

Title: Regulatory Impact Assessment
PromptText: Assess the impact of [REGULATION/POLICY] on [INDUSTRY/COMPANY]: 1. Regulatory Overview 2. Compliance Requirements 3. Business Impact Assessment 4. Risk Analysis 5. Recommended Action Plan
BestPractices: Always verify regulatory details with legal counsel. Include jurisdiction-specific considerations.

Title: Financial Summary Narrator
PromptText: Transform the following financial data into an executive narrative. Generate a narrative that: 1. Highlights key performance trends 2. Explains significant variances (>5% YoY) 3. Identifies areas of concern 4. Provides forward-looking insights 5. Recommends focus areas for next quarter. Use CFO-appropriate language.
BestPractices: Verify all calculations independently. Never rely solely on AI for financial reporting.

Title: KPI Dashboard Interpreter
PromptText: Interpret the following KPI dashboard data and provide actionable insights. For each KPI provide: Status, Root cause analysis, Recommended corrective actions, Dependencies and risks. Conclude with: Top 3 priorities, Quick wins, Metrics requiring further investigation.
BestPractices: Combine quantitative insights with qualitative context from stakeholder conversations.

Title: Thought Leadership Article Creator
PromptText: Write a thought leadership article on [TOPIC] for publication. Article Structure: 1. Compelling hook 2. Industry context 3. Unique insights 4. Case study or example 5. Actionable recommendations 6. Forward-looking conclusion. Tone: Authoritative yet accessible.
BestPractices: Include data points to support claims. Have subject matter experts review before publication.

Title: Presentation Narrative Builder
PromptText: Create a narrative flow for a presentation. Generate: 1. Opening hook (30 seconds) 2. Agenda overview 3. Section transitions with storytelling elements 4. Key slide talking points (2-3 bullets each) 5. Memorable closing statement 6. Q&A preparation points. Make it conversational, not scripted.
BestPractices: Practice the narrative out loud. Adjust for natural pauses and emphasis.

Title: Code Documentation Generator
PromptText: Generate comprehensive documentation for the following code. Documentation should include: 1. Overview/Purpose 2. Function/Class Reference 3. Usage Examples 4. Dependencies 5. Notes. Format in Markdown with proper code blocks.
BestPractices: Review generated docs for accuracy. Include edge cases the AI might miss.

Title: API Specification Writer
PromptText: Create an OpenAPI/Swagger specification for the following API. Generate a complete OpenAPI 3.0 specification including: Info section, Server configuration, Security schemes, Path definitions, Component schemas for reusable objects.
BestPractices: Validate generated spec with OpenAPI tools. Include realistic example values.

Title: Test Case Generator
PromptText: Generate comprehensive test cases covering: 1. Positive Test Cases 2. Negative Test Cases 3. Edge Cases 4. Integration Scenarios. Format each test case with: Test ID, Description, Preconditions, Steps, Expected Result, Priority.
BestPractices: Combine AI-generated cases with domain expertise. Prioritize based on risk.

Title: Architecture Decision Record
PromptText: Create an Architecture Decision Record (ADR). Structure: 1. Title 2. Status 3. Context 4. Decision 5. Options Considered 6. Consequences 7. References.
BestPractices: Include stakeholder names who approved. Link to relevant design documents.
